content.detailedDescription: Stargazing with binocs, sky mostly clear, some clouds obscuring ne horizon.  other witness mentioned possible satellite, with bright orange color.  spotted in the air coming over trees to the sw moving in a ene direction.  time was approx midnight june 16, 2012.  brightness of object was too extraordinary to be a satellite,apparent magnitude brighter than any other object in the sky, akin to full moon.  observed with binoc's seen not to have any strobes, or other observable details.  the brightness of the orb washed out, and caused aberrations within my optics.  after about 30 seconds traveling ene it gradually changed direction towards the ne horizon pulsating slightly before diminishing in magnitude and disappearing in clouds at the horizon after a further 30-50seconds.
content.summary: Extremely bright orange light, from sw, moving ne, brightness diminishing

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching a movie on the couch in our living room and we both saw a white light shoot over our house towards downtown cranbrook bc.  it looked like a shooting star but it wasn't in space.  it was maybe 100 feet off the ground.  it had a tail behind it but there was no smoke in the air after it disappeared from sight.  it made no noise that we could hear, but we were watching television at the time so if it did produce any sound we couldn't hear it.  i wouldn't have reported this at all but a friend of mine stopped by june 17th on his way back to vancouver with his wife and baby and he said that he saw the same thing in the sky when they were staying at a cabin in coleman,alberta. he described the object exactly as we saw it.  just wondering if anybody else saw this and can identify it.
content.summary: Bright light, like a shooting star.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just previously filled this form out on saturday, june 16, 2012.  unfortunately i have no pictures or video as proof.  i recently had gone to the area where this event had occurred and i had taken pictures of the area where the circular probe had traveled. in the pictures, i have shows the area in which i had a clear line of site  on the probe (20 foot diameter) 

one will have to use their imagination, i know what i saw!!! 

it could have been a gateway   for   time travel !   i don���t know, but the month of july is just around the corner. will there be another?  i don���t know. but it sure would be nice to investigate this phenomenon.
content.summary: It came from a gateway (appearance of bright white cross / then cross vanishes)

content.detailedDescription:
I had just previously filled this form out on saturday, june 16, 2012.  unfortunately i have no pictures or video as proof.  i recently had gone to the area where this event had occurred and i had taken pictures of the area where the circular probe had traveled. in the pictures, i have shows the area in which i had a clear line of site  on the probe (20 foot diameter) 

one will have to use their imagination, i know what i saw!!! 

it could have been a gateway   for   time travel !   i don���t know, but the month of july is just around the corner. will there be another?  i don���t know. but it sure would be nice to investigate this phenomenon.
content.summary: It came from a gateway (appearance of bright white cross / then cross vanishes)

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch and noticed and orb traveling very fast, i pointed my video camera at it and noticed when i zoomed in it was a solid bluish white light that had no other lights located on it. i then heard a nosie and saw another aircraft with two blinking red lights following behind it about 15 seconds after i saw the object. the sound of the engines on the blinking red light plane was clear of that of a fighter jet. i saw the orb continue to the side of my house and it then vanished with the fighter jet continuing on a path to where it was last located. i also captured another aircraft shortly after on the same flight pattern with very odd green lights on it moving very fast.
content.summary: Saw ufo traveling high rate of speed and fighter jet following

content.detailedDescription:
The assistant state director for mo. mufon recommended that i post this to the mufon website.

i hope you can tell us what we saw at wyandotte lake last night 6/16/2012. 
five of us, age ranging from 59-79 were out on a pontoon boat last night about 10:00pm. over the hill towards the east side of the lake above the tree line we saw 1 bright orange light about the size of a small street light rise up above the thick tree line. then 3 more lights in a triangular formation came up. ���then another triangular formation the same, rose up under the first one. the first single light disappeared or turned off. ���the 2 triangle formations, with 3 lights each turned into 2 lights each. the 4 lights moved around and lined up to make a straight line. then 1 single light came and 5 lights were in a straight line. the line of lights rotated counter clockwise and disappeared down into the trees. we all saw the lights about the same time. we were talking while it was happening. saying things like look there, what is that? what are we seeing? i think we just felt curious, not scared or fearful. it all happened in a moderately slow, controlled way. after it happened we just wanted to see where the lights went. we expected to see more, but that was it. afterwards everyone was talking about what happened. mostly trying to explain it in a rational way. we even moved the boat to try and see more. it happened in the opposite direction on the lake from the legends.  so we didn't think it related to activities there. one person said, maybe they were helicopters. they were too close together for helicopters. in about 15 minutes 2 helicopters started circling the lake. they looked different than the lights we all saw, we all agreed on that. wyandotte lake is on the flight path of kci. all night long we saw planes going and coming to and from kci.  the planes all looked and sounded like aircraft. this was silent, no noise. 
we saw something, we just don't know what we saw.
content.summary: 5 people in boat, wyandotte lake saw orange lights in triangular formations. 10:00pm, 6/16/2012

content.detailedDescription: Got out of my car... felt something over my left shoulder - looked then looked up. object hovered, then it nosed up, went left, straightened out and silently moved from my left to right. chevron shape, 2 lights on each wing(?) one light at tip of chevron shape. i watched it for a couple of minutes until it faded into the night sky.
content.summary: Noticed object in the night sky after exiting my car...

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:15 pm, friday, june 15th my wife and i were traveling south in our car on highway us 131 in three rivers, michigan.  the sun was just disappearing to the west as it was dark to the east.  i noticed a bright light object in the sky to my left (east) as i was driving.  the immediate thought was to see if the light was from the top of a tower such as a cell phone tower and to see if it blinked like one.  the object did not blink and the bright light of the object was moving closer toward us.  then i thought that it might be an airplane since it was moving.  i realized that it was not an airplane because it didn't have the small classic lights or blinking lights (red or white) that you see from an airplane in the sky.  as the object traveled closer, i realized that the object consisted of a bright fire-like orange glow.  i immediately found the closest side street off of the highway and parked my car.  my wife stayed in the car but i grabbed my cell phone, got out of the car and walked toward were the ufo was traveling overhead of us.  i used my iphone 4s to take pictures and a video of the ufo.  while recording the object in video mode, my wife yelled out to me from the car that another one was coming over the trees.  i moved my camera to record the other similar ufo.  there were approximately 3 more bright fire-like orange glowing objects traveling across the highway in succession.  a total of 5-6 ufo's seemed to be following each other in a pattern of about 30 seconds apart and were about 500 feet or more into the night sky above.  i believe that each ufo was about the size of a very small house.  the ufo's did not make any sound but just seem to glide effortlessly across the sky.  i was simply amazed and in awe of how big and bright they were.  each one of the ufo's flew almost directly over us toward the west and disappeared over the trees and into the clouds.  they seem to have come from over the trees and through clouds on the other side (east side) of the highway. this is a first time i've seen a ufo.  i showed my dad the footage i obtained and he told us that that was the same object he saw last year memorial day weekend.  although the bright orange glowing ufo my dad saw traveled downward toward him and his friends and suddenly, at a very high rate of speed, changed directions at about 45 degrees and disappeared into the night sky.
content.summary: We saw 5 to 6 orange glowing ufo's traveling in a row about 30 seconds apart across the highway.

content.detailedDescription: Approx 5:30 am sunday june 17th driving east on the 44 at least 5 miles from the wellston toll exit traveling at speed of approx 55 miles an hour. it was a clear early morning slightly becoming light out. i noticed in the sky a bright light i could look straight ahead thru the center top of my windshield and see what looked like an aircraft still out at a distance in approach what caught my eye is that it seemed at such a distance still maybe over the chandler area but it was so bright i kept watching it and it didn't seem to be moving either away or towards me like i believed i should notice if it was a plane.It seem to be hovering but slightly bouncing up and down. one of my friends was in the car sleeping in the passenger seat i watched the light for a few minutes and wanted to be sure what i thought i saw before i woke her because i knew if it was a obviously a plane she would just laugh at me. approx after i have driven another mile i wake her i tell her look see that light she says no i keep pointing till she sees (honestly she sort of likes her sleep so was not as enthused as i was)i ask her what she thinks by the time i look back over she has nodded back off and i feel slightly embarrassed wanting to pull over but feeling a little stupid for showing her so  i  slowed a little more but didn't want to stop on the highway as i exited the highway i approached the toll i could no longer see the light. i sort of wish i would of just stopped to know for sure myself so now that i am home thinking about it i figured i would contact you. i didn't know where to begin to check local area flights to dismiss it or not so i hope you can help thank you
content.summary: Bright hovering light i-44 approaching wellston, ok

content.detailedDescription: A red a blue and a white circle spinning in circles and the taking off threw the sky
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three circles hover out of woods trhe took off across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck talking to a friend on the phone and i saw from the north east a flaming ball with flames shooting up from it and not behind it. it was traveling like and airplane speed but it was low. then it went a short distance and stopped in the sky and the flame extinguished and it stayed as a fireball then. it turned to direct north started to go again quickly and stopped again and then took off in the same direction (north)towards lake ontario and it was a white speck and i got a picture of it then but it was just a dot. i couldn't find my camera app quick enough to get a better photo of it bet it was very close to me to see very clearly and seemed to be in open sky and i can't figure out why no one else in the area didn't see it as it crossed a main highway rt 441 and then it turned into a tiny black dot and disappeared.
content.summary: A fire ball with flame pointing upward,moving in straight line,stopped,turned,sped off.

content.detailedDescription:
3 x orbs flying over my house over two nights 

only saw one at a time and recorded all of them hd 720 video
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 x orbs flying over my house

content.detailedDescription: Well just got out of work and i was pulling out of the gas station. as i was coming up to the intersection i stopped at the light. when i noticed a an object in the sky directly infront of me. the reason i noticed it as much was because it was real real dark and circular and i have never seen that there before. at 1st i thought it was a huge fathersday ballon on top of sears. but then i realized how far i was from sears and that would have to be such a big ballon to see ot at my distance. then it started to move from right to left. and as i stared at it, it slowly was changing shape. from being just a big circle. it became oval, then it looked like it was just spining in place while it moved. it was just like forming itself as if it were liquid or something. it slowly moved over the forrest preserve from my vantage point and i then lost sight of it. while i was looking at it i was like. man what is that. am i the only one looking at this. and when i lost sight of it i wanted to see if i could see it again so i drove down to next busy street and turned to go down that street to head towards the sears where i 1st thought it to be. but i could not find anything in the sky that was remotely like it. or any were near anything like it. so i drove down the path it was taking but could not see it again. so i was kinda upset i could not get any evidence of it.
content.summary: I seen a big circular object in the sky that seemed to change shape n move above the treeline & then vanish

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my deck after midnight having a smoke, my house sets back from the main road.  all of the sudden i see this blue sphere slowing moving down the road. it was not on the road but appeared to be hovering above it. it stopped and hovered near the top of my driveway, moved backward then forward, up a little and down a little, as suddenly as it appeared, it zipped off ascending and left a blue trail for a split second. it made no noise at all.

when i saw this, my first thought was what am i seeing?  i did not feel afraid, i just began to question what it was.

the color of this sphere was a blue i have never seen before but closely resembles lapiz lazuli only more clear. it was brilliant and amazing. i just want to know what it was.
content.summary: Hovering blue sphere

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished watering horses and went into the back yard. i heard a jet and i looked up to locate it, and i saw what i thought was a "weather balloon" traveling s.W. to n.E. i was watching it drift in a wind current, then it would hover then start again. it was behaving like a "weather balloon" would behave. it moved to the left and i thought it had caught a different wind current. it came back to the right and started back in the n.E. dirrection when it changed it's shape to a cigar shape. i thought for a second my eyes were playing tricks, then it went back to the balloon shape and it looked like a smaller white orb dropped out of it and made a turn to the left and i lost sight of it. i thought o.K. i just saw cottonwood tree fluff floating in the air, but when the second orb dropped out and followed the same path as the first, going left then sort of disappearing i was stunned. i continued watching the "weather balloon" a couple of seconds more when the lady i work for called me for help and i had to assist her, so i don't know if the "weather balloon" continued in a n.E. direction.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be a weather balloon, but then looked like it changed shape to a cigar then back to a balloon shape appeared 2 orbs exited.

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:45 pm saturday june 16 observed a bright star-like object in sky, similar in brightness and size to approaching aircraft landing light, only no blinking position lights, approaching from the east-northeast but then turn and continue at an apparent upward trajectory to the south-southwest with a glowing red bell-shaped halo or aura behind it larger than the star-like object, a very distinctive looking object.  thought it may be a small asteroid skipping off the atmosphere except for this directional change.  it also seemed to accelerate as it headed south-southwest then flicker out as it was gaining altitude, the trailing red aura went out first then the yellow light dissolved into a thin line of intermittent light then vanished altogether.  before i could get my phone out it was over.  it was certainly not an airplane hence this ufo report.  my first thought was a missile test or something like it, only nothing was in the news anywhere i could find talking about any rocket launches visible from the midwest at this time.
content.summary: A bright yellow light with glowing red bell shaped halo following it

content.detailedDescription: I was at work outside on my lunch break, when the security officer said what the hell is that my self and another coworker looked and saw the bright lights moving across the sky, then changed direction and disappeared. i was able to get a quick pic with my phone. the object is the white light.
content.summary: Bright lights

content.detailedDescription: My lovely lady friend and i were sitting next to quikstop, enjoying a cigarette.  we were looking at the sky when we saw this fast moving, glowing, planet-like thing off in the distance, real high.  real crazy!!  it was like, in the ozone layer high.  but yeah.  it looked like a star.  or planet.  that was moving really fast, and glowing like a star.  ah!! ;x
content.summary: There was a flashing, starlike, super fast object

content.detailedDescription:
Ok so i've been noticing these singular orbs or more like moving stars some times dim and small sometimes bright and larger possibly due to distance who knows. i've been seeing them in the skies over waterford michigan for the past 3 years, you can see them with the naked eye, i usually yell out to my neighbors and say hey check it out! i've taken a few pictures but they were lost over time with changing phones, i never cared much for the pictures anyway it wasn't that impressive in a picture anyway, most of the time the camera wouldnt pick the light up, and when it did it's not like you could tell what it was, just a ball of light int he sky like you took a picture of a bright sometimes dim star that was close.

i have been able to see them on almost everynight that the skies are clear, maybe like 1 or 2 days out of the week i wont see any, probably because i wont stay out longer for 25 minutes usually if i dont see anything right away. they almost always, always travel north, or north east, again maybe 1 or two days out of the week i'll see one travaling south, or just plane west bound.

now the only thing they could be are satellites, if they are not, than it is unknown. infact over the 3 years, i've been able to prove to my self that some of them could infact be satellites, using gpredict i'm able to track many satellites and i've been also been able to "possibly" connect some of these sightings to satellites possibly passing in my overhead sky, all i have to do is look at the approx time and direction their orbits are and try to match it up in gpredict, sometimes i come to the conclusion that they could've infact just been satellites.

now i'm not a professional and i'm not spending any time on this(other than just looking at the sky, i've recently started using binoculars but thats it) otherwise i'd have more legible and exact time and what not.

like i said some of these could be satellites passing over the horizon and when the sun on the other side of the earth hits their reflective surfaces it makes the illusion that its glowing and than dimming after half a minute.

sometimes it's not so simple.  sometimes i'll see one that'll seem to be crusing along at a slow speed even for how far away is, untill it's to far way in space to see, even when you can see the stars around it it just disaperes and than usually approx 4-5 minutes later you'll se another, and in another 4 or 5 minutes you'll see another one, gradually going faster untill you'll see one travaling twice or three times the speed as the slow one you seen approx 12-20 minutes beforehand.

tonight i saw 7 or 8 consecutively mind you just in a small time frame of about from 10:25pm to 11:10pm traveling north and one going north east, the first couple were pretty close together time wise, like you could watch one untill it just disaperes into space and than 3-4 minutes later you'll se another going the same direction, at around the 5th or 6th they started getting 10-12 minutes apart, with the last one i saw moving way faster than any of the previous (who for how far away they look still look like they're moving as fast as a jet, but it looks like they're moving slow cause it's soooo far away) he was moving atleast 4 times that and looked equally as far away, it was very very bright when i first cought sight of it (i was looking north bound and it came over my south) but within 7 seconds as usual it just dims to a dim light, no blinking no nothing, just a hovering star.


the only option for these things are satellites nothing else floats around that high up (or higher for all i know they look exactly like stars or moreso like planets because they dont flicker, they just get bright once, and than dim... i've seen maybe 2 or 3 out of 50 in which the same object would get very bright and dim twice with in the .5 minutes you can actually watch it fly across space untill it gets to far or high that the light cannot reach your eyes anymore, it's not like theyre passing over the horoizon, or a treeline they just straight up get to high up and the light isnt powerfull enough to reach your corneass.

if you guys at mimufon  (or anyone else who wants to watch for that matter ) ever find your self in the areas of oakland county and have a clear sky look up, if you wait long enough i guarentee you will see one or two at the very least

they always almost go north

you can see them almost as soon as its dark enough that you can see stars in the sky.
content.summary: Orbs, or single balls of light seen in skies for the last 3 years.

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor and i were standing on our second story balcony, which we shared staring west over the adjacent building, when an orange/amber object became visible on the horizon. it was still light out, just before sunset. i remarked the object reminded me of a ufo and jokingly asked how much he would like to bet on it. as a child i was convinced i had been abducted, and the object seemed familiar, even though i had no clear memories of such a thing. the object stayed in place for 2 to 3 minutes and suddenly we became aware, it wasn't something normal. we continued nervously watching the hovering ball of light when suddenly and soundlessly it flew straight at us. the object hovered above the roof of our apartment complex. it was a vast, dark grey object with a matte finish, its bottom had a ring of blueish light around the edges and three orbs of orange light underneath. the object was a triangular disc with rounded corners. for 10-20 seconds it hovered silently above us and our building, then zipped away to the east without a sound. hardly believing what we had just seen, my neighbor and i ran down the stairs of our deck, to the parking lot to the east of our building and looked for anyone who also witnessed the object. there was a couple grilling out, sitting in a garage, and we asked them if they saw it. the asked us if we had been drinking, to which we replied "no" months later i asked my neighbor, to describe the object, just to see if what i remembered wasn't some kind of realistic dream. he described the object in exactly the manner i remembered it. ive always felt like this object new i was there, and purposefully revealed itself to me. it knew, i knew what it was. i have no memories of abduction, only missing periods of time during my childhood, a tendency to see objects in the sky, particularly at dusk and dawn, but i always brushed it off as a childhood fear of aliens. this moment solidified in my mind that these event must have happened because this time there was a witness who agreed we saw the same, seemingly impossible object. i have to say when the object was hovering over my head, i wasn't scared, like i had been before, just seeing lights in the distance. i felt it knew i wanted to see it, that there was intelligence there, but no malice.
content.summary: A light in the distance zoomed toward myself and my neighbor and hovered over our roof

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on the side deck of my home stargazing, it was a partly cloudly night, so a fair amount of the light from the city was blocked, and more stars were visible than normal.

i quickly caught the object in my peripheral vision and turned my head automatically, thinking it may have been a bat or bird, until it suddenly stopped in midair, i could hear a faint static noise being emitted from it, it floated in place for several seconds, i could not see any motion from the object, a strange feeling fell over me, most likely a mix of excitement and nervousness/fear that i was actually seeing it. i stood there motionless and silent as i stared.
after a few seconds of staying motionless, the object made a semicircular motion, and left the area at an extreme rate of speed, disappearing from the horizon within about a second, maybe a second and a half.

though this may be unrelated, the nearby military base is currently closed down to all but the personnel they deem necessary on it over the weekend.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black circular like object, fast moving, made somewhat high pitched static noise, arrived quickly, hovered for a few seconds, then left.

content.detailedDescription: I love the weather but this is the 3rd strange sphere or 'dot' i've captured in my picture. also i notice an 'eye' cloud formation in two photos with this latest one has the eye and the sphere together! i have repasted the other two so that all 3 pictures are viewable together although they were taken on 3 different ocasions and all this year. if anyone has seen similar please share thanks, mufon!
content.summary: This is the 3rd strange sphere "dot" i have in my pictures. notice the cloud formation like an eye.

content.detailedDescription: From city of vassar looking eastward can see 6 lights glowing yellowish orange in color at first are bright and then fade away. now only 4 lights glowing.
content.summary: First 6 lights then 4, faded and brightened

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog and it was a very calm evening about 10:04 pm on may 29, 2012. while walking south on arlington avenue notice a large fireball looking round object moving southeast at appoximately 30 degrees. took first picture with my cell camera and then looked at it and seemed to be more teardrop shaped. then took a second picture and then looked at it and noticed that it was moving further away and there was actually a second similar object in the picture.
content.summary: Large fireball looking round object moving southeast

content.detailedDescription: Appeared to be metal disk that randomly blinked and hovered in one spot for a while, then drifted north and looked like a boomarang.
content.summary: Appeared to be metal disk that randomly blinked and hovered in one spot for a while, then drifted north and looked like a boomarang,

content.detailedDescription:
I was out at approximately 9:30pm on june 16th, 2012 walking my dogs when i observed 3 orange objects traveling east to west in the sky above me for approximately 2 to 3 minutes before they assended upward going out of view. i was able to get my girlfriend out to view the last minute or so of the event.
at 9:38pm the exact same event happened with a single object traveling the same path and then accending out of view.

some poor quality video was obtained of the second event which i can send upon request.
content.summary: Approximately 9:30pm 3 orange spheres traveling east to west and then accended. followed by a single light at 9:38pm doing the same thing.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i had just finished eating at a restaurant in beaumont, texas. it was about 10:00 pm, central time. on the way out to the car, in the parking lot, i looked up and saw what i thought was an airplane. 

i kept watching it, and i realized that it didn't have the same type of lights as an airplane does. the lights were white, unlike airplane lights that are green, red, and white, and they were flashing in sequence. 

there was no noise such as you hear when a jet flies overhead. the object was silent or nearly silent.

the object appeared to be triangular, but it was very hard to tell, since it was dark outside at the time. i didn���t see any real outline of the object, again probably because it was so dark. it took a straight path over my head and over the restaurant.

i took a video (i take my camera everywhere), but it was extremely difficult to keep the camera stable without a tripod. i���m always aggravated with ufo videos that are taken by a camera operator with a shaky hand, but now i realize just how hard it is to keep a moving object in the shot while also trying to watch it yourself.

i was very excited, because i'd never seen anything like this before. eventually the object just flew too far to keep track of. i still don't know what it was, but i'd certainly like to. it would be fantastic if someone has the proper equipment to stabilize this clip and/or do some sort of analysis. as it is, you can't tell much at all. also, i'm sorry for the language at the end.
content.summary: 3 white lights flashing in sequence over beaumont, texas

content.detailedDescription: My daughter,her boyfriend and i were up at the cottage for father's day and just out on the deck viewing a beautiful starry cloudless night when my daughter noticed coming over her left shoulder a craft that was saucer shaped and glowing a brilliant white, coming out of the west over black donald lake heading east...As it moved across the sky it appeard as if the object was starting to move slightly side to side or quiver as it continued to traverse a straight course when before our eyes it started to go transparent with and changed to a fading orange streak and disapeared or cloaked....The aprox height was it was flying was about a mile and as it first pass over us you could see the side,the bump on the top in middle,it was moving along pretty good but not as fast as you would think,kinda taking it's time on cruise control,definately no meteor ot asteroid,freaking amazing to see....This is my 3rd,now that i have witnesses that i'm not crazy they finally believe now.
content.summary: Stargazing ufo passed over our heads from behind
